about_the_game:
For the ultimate Little Busters! fan, the PERFECT Vocal Collection is now available on Steam!
With 23 vocal tracks from the original game, the anime adaptations, as well as character song releases, this album is the PERFECT addition to any Little Busters! fan's collection!
Download the Little Busters! PERFECT Vocal Collection now and enjoy your favorite Little Busters! songs!

* This soundtrack DLC is a digital version of the original 2014 album Little Busters! PERFECT Vocal Collection (KLSA-0095-96) and features 23 tracks.

Little Busters!/Kud Wafter PERFECT Vocal Collection Track list

1. Little Busters!

2. Rin's Secret Love Song (Rin no Hisoka na Koi no Uta)
3. How to Make Pickles Tasty (Pickles wo Oshikusuru Tsukurikata)
4. Saya's Sleepy Requiem (Saya no Nemureru Requiem)
5. Jupinyer
6. Faraway (Haruka Kanata)
7. raison
8. Mission:Love sniper
9. The Cat, the Glass, and the Round Moon (Neko to Garasu to Marui Tsuki)
10. Sunshine After the Rain (Amenochi Hare)
11. Song for friends
12. Alicemagic ~Rockstar ver.~
13. Little Busters! ~TV animation ver.~
14. Alicemagic ~TV animation ver.~
15. Fireworks (Hanabi)
16. Our Journey (Bokura no Tabi)
17. Little Busters! Synth-Magnetic Megamix
18. Boys be Smile
19. Waking Up In the Morning With You Beside Me (Mezameta Asa ni wa Kimi ga Tonari ni)
20. Saya's Song
21. Tear-colored Wings (Namidairo no Tsubasa)
22. What I Lost With You (Kimi to no Nakushimono)
23. Boys be Smile ~Remix~
